text: We add a class name to body when modals and widgets are open, which hides the chat button altogether. Imagine implementing that CSS with the max int value though. Pretty audacious.

"Chat bubble is not always visible"
"OK, the fix is in"

Hey all - The edits for the single click cacheBuster finally went through to the store. Everything seems to be working fine now! Feel free to use it! <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/cache-buster/ielbkmdmcbfjjlninnabnbdllapokiab/related?hl=en&authuser=3>
